Take Action Now

{include "default_salutation"} –

This week, the Supreme Court of the United States announced it will consider a case that could have a wide-ranging impact on access to reproductive healthcare across the entire nation. We know that this case is the opportunity that anti-abortion activists have dreamed of for years – an anti-abortion majority on the Supreme Court ready to strike a blow at the heart of Roe v. Wade.

We must be clear: the same activists that gave us the Parental Notice of Abortion Act (PNA) in Illinois are now encouraging the Supreme Court to end the right to abortion altogether. Illinois' PNA law ignores the harms to young people when they are denied care, and limits access to abortion to advance a political agenda.

Take action by calling now to tell your state legislators to repeal PNA:

  • Call your state senator at 1-866-974-8813.
  • Call your state representative at 1-866-587-3023.

In Illinois, we have worked hard to put protections in place so that every person has a fundamental right to make healthcare decisions for themselves, including accessing abortion care. But as long as PNA is on the books, our work is not done. With your voice, we can continue protecting reproductive freedom in Illinois right now, no matter what anti-abortion activists do.

It is time to finish the work of protecting access to reproductive healthcare in Illinois by repealing PNA.

Make your voice heard in support of SB 2190!

  • Call your state senator at 1-866-974-8813.
  • Call your state representative at 1-866-587-3023.

Let your legislators know that it is time to repeal this law in Illinois.
